main event: A witness observed a bluish halo-shaped object, similar in size to a car, while driving in Rome, Italy on July 21, 1963.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds,The object did not pass behind or in front of any other objects,It emitted a bright light and then disappeared from sight,The investigation involved multiple military personnel and correspondence,The object was observed to hover before changing positions quickly.
witness description: The witness described the object as having bright light with no detailed features.
